topic.title: How to Factory Reset Grandstream Phones
topic.shortdesc: Before you start to provision Grandstream phones with , you need to reset Grandstream phones to factory default settings. Otherwise, Auto Provision may fail because of the previous configurations on the phone.

body.p: This guide takes Grandstream GXP1610 running firmware 1.0.4.100 as an example.

ol.li:
Find the phone IP address.
Press the OK key when the phone is idle, navigate to Status Network Status on the phone.

Log in the phone web interface with your username and password.
username: admin
password: admin

Click OK to reset the phone.
The phone will be reset successfully after startup.
Do not power off during phone startup.
